commands.summary: Initialize the project output root and write the minimal project config.
Write the canonical attempt outcome to feedback.json (primary evidence).
Append a bounded/redacted note event to notes.jsonl (secondary evidence).
Compute attempt.report.json from tool.calls.jsonl + feedback.json.
Validate artifact integrity (schemas, ids, bounds, containment) with typed error codes.
Check environment/config sanity (write access, config parse, optional runner availability).
Retention cleanup under .zcl/runs (age/size; respects pinned runs).
Pin/unpin a run (toggles run.json.pinned) so gc will keep it.
Optional runner enrichment (writes runner.ref.json + runner.metrics.json).
MCP stdio proxy funnel (records initialize/tools/list/tools/call).
HTTP reverse proxy funnel (records inbound requests/responses as tool=http op=request).
Run a command through the ZCL CLI funnel (default passthrough; bounded trace capture; optional full capture + JSON envelope).
Print the ZCL surface contract (artifact layout + supported schema versions).

commands.usage: zcl attempt start --suite <suiteId> --mission <missionId> [--prompt <text>] [--suite-file <path>] [--run-id <runId>] [--agent-id <id>] [--isolation-model process_runner|native_spawn] [--mode discovery|ci] [--timeout-ms N] [--timeout-start attempt_start|first_tool_call] [--blind] [--blind-terms <csv>] [--out-root .zcl] [--retry 1] [--env-file <path>] [--env-format sh|dotenv] [--print-env sh|dotenv] --json
commands.summary: Allocate a run/attempt directory and print canonical IDs + env for a fresh session attempt.
Write attempt.report.json, then run validate + expect (uses ZCL_OUT_DIR when <attemptDir> is omitted).
Fast post-mortem view: show ids/outcome, validate/expect status, and a tail of tool.calls.jsonl (uses ZCL_OUT_DIR when <attemptDir> is omitted).

commands.usage: zcl suite plan --file <suite.(yaml|yml|json)> [--run-id <runId>] [--mode discovery|ci] [--timeout-ms N] [--timeout-start attempt_start|first_tool_call] [--blind on|off] [--blind-terms <csv>] [--out-root .zcl] --json
commands.summary: Allocate attempt dirs for every mission in a suite file and print env/pointers per mission (for orchestrators).

commands.usage: zcl suite run --file <suite.(yaml|yml|json)> [--run-id <runId>] [--mode discovery|ci] [--timeout-ms N] [--timeout-start attempt_start|first_tool_call] [--blind on|off] [--blind-terms <csv>] [--session-isolation auto|process|native] [--parallel N] [--total M] [--out-root .zcl] [--strict] [--strict-expect] [--shim <bin>] [--capture-runner-io] --json -- <runner-cmd> [args...]
commands.summary: Run a suite with capability-aware isolation selection, wave parallelism, and just-in-time attempt allocation, then finish/validate/expect each attempt.
Best-effort replay of tool.calls.jsonl to reproduce failures (partial support by tool/op).
Evaluate suite expectations against feedback.json (JSON output includes failures; exit code indicates pass/fail).

errors.summary: Filesystem I/O error while writing artifacts.
Missing required artifact(s) for the requested operation.
Primary evidence is missing/empty (e.g. empty tool.calls.jsonl).
Invalid JSON in an artifact file.
Invalid JSONL stream (bad line or empty line in strict mode).
Unsupported schema version for an artifact/event.
IDs in artifacts/events do not match expected attempt/run IDs.
Artifact/event violates the ZCL contract shape.
Artifact path escapes attempt/run directory (symlink traversal).
Failed to spawn or execute a wrapped command in the funnel.
Wrapped tool execution completed with a non-zero outcome.
Timed out waiting for a tool operation.
Blind mode rejected a prompt containing harness terms.
Primary evidence missing/empty despite a final outcome being recorded (funnel bypass suspected).
Suite expectations did not match feedback.json.
